column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Adam - Thank you for your review and for bringing this issue to my attention. First
column2: I'd like to apologize for your experience at our restaurant. Our ultimate goal is for every customer to leave our establishment happy and satisfied. And although you mentioned your displeasure with our bartender's service
column3: it does sound like you enjoyed our ramen
column4: so for that I thank you.
